attributes.action: Revoke article 50:  The issue is too complex to vote Leave or Remain.
attributes.additional_details: On top of austerity leaving the EU will cost the UK £39,000,000,000.  The public were never asked to take this into consideration.
attributes.background: The EU referendum was wrong to approach the public with a simple yes or no answer to a question that cannot be answered by yes or no.  The government had no plan and the public were not informed enough to make such a decision.
